sentences.en: Chinese scientists have successively discovered ten archaeopteryx - type fossils in the Beipiao region of Liaoxi this year.
sentences.cn: 中国科学家今年先后在辽西北票地区发现十枚始祖鸟类化石.

sentences.en: Except some with the birds similar characteristic, the archaeopteryx has the beastly foot class dinosaur's characteristic.
sentences.cn: 除了一些与鸟类相似的特征, 始祖鸟具有很多兽脚类恐龙的特征.

sentences.en: However, the study of archaeopteryx has never stopped.
sentences.cn: 但是, 关于始祖鸟的研究,却一直源源不断.

sentences.en: Paleontologists also debated whether Archaeopteryx could fly.
sentences.cn: 古生物学家还讨论了始祖鸟是否会飞的问题.

trans.tran_en: any of several extinct primitive birds constituting the genus Archaeopteryx, esp A
